node.html: Trained and persisted a Spark ML Pipeline on UNSW-NB15 dataset using Random Forest Classifier to classify incoming network flows into normal and malicious, attaining an accuracy of 97.28%

frontmatter.title: Prediction of trip-duration of NYC Citi Bike trips

node.html:
• Examined Citi Bike ridership data 2019, joined with daily NYC weather data, to study the impact of weather on shared bike usage and generate a predictive model which can estimate the average trip duration of each ride
  • Evaluated the performance of different models attaining an RMSE of 5.5 and an adjusted R squared score of 0.72
Performed EDA, feature engineering and trained an XGBoost Regressor to predict the price of Airbnb listings in New York City attaining an adjusted R squared score of 0.61 and rmse of 45.2
